Plot: The adventures of the sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.
Title: Popeye
Writer: Jules Feiffer (screenplay), E.C. Segar (based on characters by)
Actors: Robin Williams, Shelley Duvall, Ray Walston, Paul Dooley
tomatoConsensus: Altman's take on the iconic cartoon is messy and wildly uneven, but its robust humor and manic charm are hard to resist.
